function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Economic breakdown in iran due to sanctions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases in crowded cities due to interactions in social and professional settings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of coyotes in downtown-adjacent neighborhood","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in urban soundscape due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transformation of urban soundscape as a reduction in the sounds of capitalism","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Anti-density discourse may reinforce overcrowding in homes due to insane rents.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Change in urban soundscape due to social distancing and lockdown measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Change in city soundscape due to covid-19 containment measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Absence of people in the city","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of public transportation and crowded areas in cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stereotypical representations modernity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rigid polarities and flat totalisations in twentieth-century thinking","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Loss of geographical sensibility in spatial storytelling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of dialogue between individual contributors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of communication and dialogue in organizing cities and lives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate use of podcasting and radio as research dissemination propagation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anxiety and self-reflection can affect the ability to objectively analyze and address contagious disease propagation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focusing on faraway lands may result in neglecting local contagious disease propagation awareness or consideration for contagious disease transmission during audio recording","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration for privacy and consent during recording","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Interpreting vague instructions leading to different interpretations of the task","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of the task leading to off-topic submissions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of covid-19
